Title: No Time To Die
Bio:
In the 25th James Bond movie No Time to Die,
    	James has left his turbulent life as a secret agent
    	and leads a quiet life in Jamaica.
    	This is interrupted abruptly when his old friend and CIA agent Felix Leiter
    	he asks to help free a kidnapped scientist.
    	This mission turns out to be more insidious than imagined and leads Bond to track down a 
    	mysterious villain armed with perilous new technology.

Title: Knives Out
Bio:
When well-known crime writer Harlan Thrombey is found dead on his estate shortly after his 85th birthday, 
    	the curious and charming Detective Benoit Blanc is called in to investigate his death. 
    
	From Harlan's complex family to his devoted staff Blanc blends his way through a web of lies and deceit 
    	to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death With Knives Out, award-winning writer and director 
    	Rian Johnson pays tribute to the books of Agatha Christie in the form of a light-hearted 
    	and modern murder mystery where anyone can be a suspect.

Title: Rundfunk: Jachterwachter
Bio:
The hard-working Guard Watchman runs HIVO camp without help. 
    	The arrival of the decrepit ex-world star Ronnie Bosboom Jr. seems to be a blessing,
    	but when he turns out to be a refugee from dangerous criminals,
    	the duo must do everything they can to camping. 
    	And all that very funny.
